Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Speechless \Speech"less\, a. 1. Destitute or deprived of the faculty of speech. [1913 Webster]
2. Not speaking for a time; dumb; mute; silent. [1913 Webster]
Speechless with wonder, and half dead with fear. --Addison. [1913 Webster] -- {Speech"less*ly}, adv. -- {Speech"less*ness}, n. [1913 Webster]
speechless adj : unable to speak temporarily; "struck dumb"; "speechless with shock" [syn: {dumb}]
